video_title: Coping Keeps You Stuck In Life @RTGame
transcript:
I recently saw a study that I thought
was really fascinating that people who
develop very strong emotional coping
mechanisms tend to not progress in life
okay it's kind of weird right because
you think like ingrained and ingrained
in the habit almost is it well so I
